I'm Aniket. I love to code, listen to music and I even write free-verses at times. A majority of my work is writing syntax for design.

By Aniket Pant

Aniket Pant me@aniketpant.com aniketpant.com

Three of my tools are Codeigniter, Laravel and WordPress. But there is another power that I have which allows me to think of great application architectural designs. Other than that I love to speak at events and occasionally write poetry.

If you wish to consult me for any project, or if you want me to speak at an event, say hello.

What am I doing nowadays?

Nowadays I am working full time as the Curator of Mark My Word which is India's First Content and Design Conference scheduled to happen on Feb 2, 2013.
